entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:38 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:29 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
